com.ivj.squirrelgame.board

Class FlattenedBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ivj.squirrelgame.board.FlattenedBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardView, com.ivj.squirrelgame.core.EntityContext

    public class FlattenedBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ivj.squirrelgame.core.EntityContext, BoardView
    Class representing a Board with a 2d container. Implements most of the game's logic related to collision
    Author:

      • spawnMiniSquirrel

        public boolean spawnMiniSquirrel(MasterSquirrel master,
                                 XY direction,
                                 int energy)
                          throws NotEnoughEnergyException
        Description copied from interface: com.ivj.squirrelgame.core.EntityContext
        Spawns, updates board and field, MiniSquirrel with energy and in direction from the master, direction is truncated to one move. Spawning fails on too low energy or invalid position
        Specified by:
        spawnMiniSquirrel in interface com.ivj.squirrelgame.core.EntityContext
        Parameters:
        master - from which it is spawned, needed e.g for its energy
        Returns:
        true if spawning successful, false if not
        Throws:
        NotEnoughEnergyException

      • calculateCellsInCircle

        public static java.util.List<XY> calculateCellsInCircle(XY center,
                                                        int radius)
        Calculates positions of cells in a Grid which are in the circle with a center and a radius. So it basically rasterizes the circle line, but returns also the grid cell positions which are in the circle. It doesn't truncate the coordinates, so e.g with a center of 5,5 and a radius of 10, there will be negative coordinates. If the radius is <=0, only the coordinate of the center is returned.
        Parameters:
        center - the center of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        List of Positions in Circle
